name: Vendor Payables Tracker
description: This template helps categorize and analyze unpaid vendor bills, helping businesses manage their payables more efficiently.Are you looking to automate PDF generation for repetitive documents like invoices, agreements, contracts, certificates, reports, letters etc?PDFOutput helps automate PDF generation for documents using Notion Database and a Google Doc!No Coding Required, No Technical Skills Needed, Just One-Click Automation!It requires 2 things: Google Doc Template: A template file with placeh
features: Google Doc Template: A template file with placeholders in {{...}} format (e.g.,{{InvoiceNumber}},{{ClientName}}).; Notion Database: Acts as a database with matching headers likeClientName,InvoiceDatefor seamless placeholder mapping.; Easy to add vendor details as perRegular vendors,Occasional vendorsandSeasonal vendorsto track vendor details easily.; TrackInvoices Due and Not Paidto assessVendor Aging Analysisas per the Invoices Due Period of0 - 30 Days,31 - 60 Days,61- 90 Days,91+ DaysorPaid statuseasily under one dashboard.; Available for MacOS, Windows OS, iOS and Android devices.
